caption: Great pizza and service!
I went just for the deep fried oreos
Hands down the best pizza I have ever had.

I'm from New Jersey and finding a simple thin-crust cheese pie this good on the west coast is hard. Great dough and fantastic sauce. Though I never thought I'd see the day of $25 pies, I'll be coming back.
This is some of the best pizza I’ve had in a long time. Love this place a lot and their non traditional toppings. The balsamic drizzle is AMAZING!!
Great taste and fast.
Hard 10. Expensive but worth every penny.
Best pizza in Oakland. Maybe in california

Good people who are serving, but truthfully the Pizza tasted as average as a Red Baron frim a store. They definitely had large slices that you can buy individually, but a little more burnt on the edges than what I expected. Comparatively from what I've had with other places, they were more costly than most for what you get 😒
Killer slices
Stopped here on our way home from an event. Awesome pizza and outdoor space with a heat lamp and tables. Would stop here again for sure. Recommended!
I love pizza and stumbled on this driving by one night. Chill people great pizza. Cheese with basil 🌿
Easily in the top 3 pizza places in the whole Bay Area. Love this place and will keep coming back for that Cloud!!
Well formed dough that gives a crispy but airy crust that's fine. Ingredients at the first rate make a difference. A good surprise was the fried squash blossoms.
If you want a pizza dripping in oil than this is your place .
Oh man my girl and I love this place
Best Slices in the Bay
Best pizza in the town hands down

Tasty but don't expect any changes to be recognized. Twice I asked for modifications and ended up with stuff I did not want. If they could get it right more than 1 out of three times I would give 5 stars.
Best pizza hands down in Oakland black owned I love it
Great pizza and cheesecake by the slice.
Slices to go and full pies, this shop does it all. Pizza is heavenly, perfect ratio of toppings, sauce and crust. Staff genuinely cares about customer experience.
Excellent slices and beer
Best pizza and calzones ever. Love the Cloud Pizza and the Roll Call Pizza. Both meat and veggie calzones are incredible !
Underrated place. Came to support and try out their pizza and loved it. Always order online 20 mins before getting there on the way and get it nice and hot.
Amazing pizza and I drive an hour every time to get the cloud. The ricotta and the sauce and the sausage is just heaven.

This was my first time at this store and when arriving, I asked when the food will be ready since my app said it was ready for pickup. After that, one of the workers got irate and yelled, "we're busy, we work on our time, not the app time. …
This spot is awesome! Fair pricing, considerable portions and the employees are always very kind.
Great customer service with a smile
Delicious, ny style pizza makes this a bright spot in the neighborhood. Take-out only for now, but I'm looking forward to their back patio re-opening. Someday.
I just like their dishes. I always get awesome customer service here. The place is well kept and the workers are always friendly. Will come visit again.
Pizza wasn't what I thought it would be but it a quick fit for your tummy. Long wait.
One of the best tapas places in NJ. Too many places treat tapas as a novelty, and up-charge so much for mediocre food. Not Casa d'Paco.
Delicious pizza, it's my go to spot!
Pizza was great! Kind of expensive but it was delicious!
Late making an order

Great pizza! Crust is light and chewy, sauce was not obtrusive. I hate black olives but didn't mind them at all on their The Yards pizza. I definitely would visit again. Be mindful that due to the road closure on 7th you have a one way road turning into Washington - rather awkward. So Washington is basically a dead end street.
Best pizza in town
Addicted to this pie

This is my favorite pizza spot in Oakland and pretty much order from them on a weekly basis. The Cloud pizza is by far my favorite. I've never had anything like that before with the garlicky sauce and the ricotta cheese. It is really incredible.

I generally love their pizza, I think it is some of the best in Oakland, if not the best. There was an issue with a salad not being what they had shown in their picture on doordash (a caesar missing croutons and parmesan) and their pizza …
Tastes amazing, slices are huge.
I don't remember being here.... But Google does??
Really delicious pizza and friendly staff. Just awesome.
Great hours, great customer service, choice of slice or whole pie, sauce and cheese a tad flat in flavor however good pizza. Sincerely, a Chicagoan.

Absolutely phenomenal pizza! I recently discovered Graffiti Pizza through Uber Eats and my wife and I probably order once a week or close to it. A friend drove up from Southern California and we ordered it and he continues to bring it up when we chat. I highly recommend, they're also very fast and the food shows up hot. Big fan!
I had doordash order frist they said 20 mins after 20 mis she said 15  mins  more and now almost 45 mins they don’t give any order! Not good
Amazingly good pizza we have had it 4 times in the last month black owned business go eat and enjoy. Nice salads as well.   Roll Call is my spirit pizza 🍕.

Graffiti pizza is consistently the best delivery experience i have when ordering in Oakland. Their pizza is suitable and holds well for delivery or takeout (hand tossed crust). Regarding takeout, their pick up times can be a bit long, but …
I ordered the "Old School" and they delivered to my place quickly. Definitely satiating when desiring New York style pizza.
The pizza was delicious!
Good music, was open late after a night out with fam. The pizza was pretty good.

I had ordered on DoorDash and DoorDash screwed up and the delivery was almost an hour late. I was expecting the food to be cold soggy nasty but this was my first time ordering from graffiti pizza. I was so shocked and surprised that they …
Great slices of pizza... always good combo selection along with traditional cheese or pepperoni... and they got spirits... homerun...
its easily the best pizza in oakland i had the peproni and it was perfect its goated
LOVE THE PIZZA💫
Its just so tasty. Though, Not cheap.

My new favorite pizza place! Love that they have a few classic options that are always available but also have a few specialty pizzas that they rotate through. I also think the pizzas are priced pretty fairly, something that isn't always the case in Old Oakland.
ALWAYS GOOD. COME HERE AND EAT THE PIZZA.

Great pizza. Horrible in store customer service. I’ve been there twice and was ignored both times. Even after talking to the owner on the first visit they still have not improved their customer service.  If you want good pizza, order it and have it delivered. If you want a horrible service go in the store.
Just good tasting. Solid pizza
Pizza was delicious and the staff super friendly. Can't wait till they get beer on tap!

This is the best pizza I’ve had since I moved from nyc  the slices are better than a whole pizza I like a crunchy crust, but the seasoning  cheese and sauce is really good even my daughter loves it and she doesn’t  like pizza
A chill place that sells amazing pizza.
The pepperoni has the Cups
I've lived in oakland for 11 years. pizza is my favorite food. I have tried pizza from every place withing 10 miles of downtown. This is the best pizza in Oakland. No competition.
Makes me miss the neighborhood pizza joints I practically live in when visiting Brooklyn.
Delicious pizza. Exceeded my expectations. Staff were very friendly also.

Despite the street front appearances the pizza here is incredible. Really good service and the pizza chef came out to check everything was OK.  I'd post a photo but it was so good it didn't last long enough.

Tony G prodigy n world champion zza maker is exciting to have in Oakland. Teaching his trade to the willing which equals yummy for us. They are just getting this this rolling and it'll be fun to watch how it grows. $5 cheese zza makes a …

Deep in the heart of downtown Oakland hides this secret little gem of the pizzeria world, it's a little hard to find, but the search is completely worth it! If you dont believe me just stop by and find out for yourself! Best NY style pizza …

I've been waiting for the East Bay to get a good pizza maker back for at least the last 20 years. Thank goodness for Graffiti Pizza. I always tip in the 50 to 60% range because these people earn it. Please be generous with them and eat there often as I do.
Just got into town from a long trip and was met with a warm welcome and a hot fresh 14 inch gourmet pizza! Definitely recommend this pizzeria!🍕👍🏼🤤
Great New York style pizza. Freshly made ones have a great crispy crust, rich tomato sauce, and melty cheese.
Best pizza in Oakland. Hands down

One of my new favorite pizza places. Came here for dinner on a Friday night with a large group. They have a patio in the back with a bunch of seating which was perfect. I got a slice of the cheese and a slice of the pepperoni and mushroom. …

Our first Graffiti pizza and it is a home run! We are Bay Area pizza fanatics and one of us is from NYC with 60 years of pizza experience. Tonight we had The Cloud pizza, which is right next to heaven. What makes this pizza so good is the exceptional dough and balance of flavors. Looking forward to our next one!
Delicious pizza, helpful and nice staff. A little on the expensive side.
Great pizza, great customer service, and cozy establishment.
Wow! Amazing pizza! Great service! I’ll definitely go back.
pretty good actually. decent prices too. nice back patio. i'd definitely go back.

Super good, NY-style pizza. The only thing close to New York that I've been able to find in the Bay. Love that they have slice pie. Everyone that works there is super nice too, so that helps. Will be making this place my regular.

Good pizza everyone should stop by and try it. Hand tossed pizza made hourly using the freshest ingredients and skills. You just don't know what they've going until you try. Drop what you're doing and get yourself a slice see for yourself. You'll be glad you came.
Hole-in-the-wall pizza joint. Quick slices or made-to-order pie. Quiet, outside seating in back.
International Pizza Expo champion that opened his own spot, absolutely phenomenal.
Amazing pizza and great customer service. This dude is a pizza champion and the quality shows. They still beer and have a chill back patio. Glad this spot opened up in the neighborhood.
Great pizza, inconsistent hours. Tried to go today and they’re closed 😕
